properties.name: SHAPEXOR
properties.description: Replaces the shape in the destination image with the loaded selection.

properties.name: SHAPEINTERSECT
properties.description: The resulting shape is the area of intersection between the two shapes.

properties.name: SHAPESUBTRACT
properties.description: Subtracts the loaded shape from the selection is the destination image.

name: ShapeOperation
description: Specifies how to combine the shapes if the destination image already has a selection.
